properties.name: graceful-backoff.check-interval
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, between each lookup of failed neighbours in the database.

properties.name: graceful-backoff.check-offset
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, from application startup until lookup for failed neighbours in the database.

properties.name: graceful-backoff.number-of-attempts
properties.description: Number of times we are allowed to reattempt a POST or a GET to a failed neighbour.

properties.name: graceful-backoff.random-shift-upper-limit
properties.description: The upper limit, in milliseconds, of the random shift used in backoff POST and GET.

properties.name: graceful-backoff.start-interval-length
properties.description: The length, in milliseconds, of the base waiting time of backoff.
